data.title: What made the Spartans so good at fighting in a phalanx formation? Why didn't other Greeks use the same tactics?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): Most of the Ancient city states in Greece used more or less the same hoplitic phalanx tactics.

The prowess of the Spartans with this was due to the fact that they did not do other professions in their daily lives, thus having more time to practice.
